name: Neon Marble: Space Rush
description:
Neon Marble is a simple but really addictive game!

If you love games like Luxor or Zuma this free app is a great challenge.

No frogs or egyptians, only deep space and a fresh neon graphic.

How to play :

- Touch the screen where you want to shoot.

- Match 3 or more same Marbles to eliminate them.

- Make Combos of Marbles to gain Diamonds to spend on powerups.

- To use a powerup ball tap the gun, each tap costs three Diamonds.

Tips :

- To change the color of the shooting marble just get rid of it by shooting it into the free space.

- Combos are really important, try to create multiple Chains of them !

Features :

- Easy to play, it is fun for all age players.

- 115 levels and 115 different paths.

- 5 power-ups to help you pass harder levels.

If you find a bug or do you want give us some tips about this game please feel free to mail us at : spmobilegames@gmail.com

Thanks for your help!
